CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to load the image 'http://example.test:8000/resources/square.png?data-frame' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "img-src 'none'".

PASS Image loaded in top-level blocked. 
PASS Image loaded via data: window blocked.
